CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [2][3][4][5] It has also been demonstrated that low band - gap conjugated polymers with broad absorption of the solar spectrum are promising active layer materials to achieve a high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are:

1. Low band - gap conjugated polymers
2. Active layer materials

Therefore, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "Low band - gap conjugated polymers" and "Active layer materials".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! My apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. Low band - gap conjugated polymers

So, the only Material Name entity in the paragraph is "Low band - gap conjugated polymers".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Low band - gap conjugated polymers |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [2][3][4][5] It has also been demonstrated that low band - gap conjugated polymers with broad absorption of the solar spectrum are promising active layer materials to achieve a high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the "Property Value" entities are:

1. Band gap: This is a property of the polymers that refers to the energy difference between the valence and conduction bands of the material. A lower band gap indicates a material that can absorb a broader range of the solar spectrum.
2. Power conversion efficiency (PCE): This is a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell in converting incident light into electrical energy. A high PCE indicates a material that is effective at converting solar energy into usable electricity.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. Band gap: This is a property of the polymers that refers to the energy difference between the valence and conduction bands of the material.
2. Power conversion efficiency (PCE): This is a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell in converting incident light into electrical energy.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| band gap |
| power conversion efficiency (PCE) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
